security-firewall-subtitle: Harden the admin network with proactive IP controls, rate limiting, geo fencing, and automated alerts across every site.
security-firewall-overview-desc: Snapshot of blacklist activity, throttling, geo fencing, and automation posture.
security-firewall-overview-empty: No firewall metrics are available yet.
security-firewall-card-blacklist-message: Firewall currently tracks %d blocked IP addresses.
security-firewall-card-blacklist-hint: Review the blocked list weekly and expire stale entries to keep the list accurate.
security-firewall-card-blacklist-empty: No blocked IPs detected. Enable brute-force protection or WAF rules to populate telemetry.
security-firewall-card-ratelimit-message: Lockouts trigger after %d failures within %d minutes.
security-firewall-card-ratelimit-hint: Keep strict thresholds to limit password spraying without impacting legitimate editors.
security-firewall-card-ratelimit-risk: Thresholds look permissive. Reduce allowed retries or extend the cooldown window.
security-firewall-card-geo-message: %d regions currently restricted from the admin network.
security-firewall-card-geo-hint: Maintain a deny list for high-risk territories or high-noise data centers.
security-firewall-card-geo-empty: Geo blocking disabled. Consider restricting administrative access to trusted regions only.
security-firewall-card-automation-messag: %d webhook endpoints will be notified on firewall events.
security-firewall-card-automation-hint: Send firewall events to chat or SIEM channels for faster incident response.
security-firewall-card-automation-empty: No automation connected yet. Wire alerts into Slack, Teams, or PagerDuty.
security-firewall-section-ip-desc: Manage trusted sources and blocked actors for the entire network.
security-firewall-whitelist-empty: Whitelist is empty. Add team office IPs or trusted VPN ranges for easier auditing.
security-firewall-section-rate-desc: Compare throttling thresholds per site and spot hotspots instantly.
security-firewall-rate-empty: No rate limiting data available yet.
security-firewall-section-geo-desc: Countries or regions denied from reaching the admin perimeter.
security-firewall-section-ua-desc: Detect bots and crawlers using UA signatures and targeted responses.
security-firewall-section-paths-desc: Protect admin endpoints and API routes with extra friction.
security-firewall-section-webhooks-desc: Endpoints subscribed to firewall anomalies and rate-limit events.
security-firewall-section-alerts-desc: Recent firewall decisions, throttling, and suspicious access attempts.
security-firewall-section-recommendation: Quick wins to strengthen the firewall perimeter before the next release.
security-firewall-recommendation-blackli: Review blocked IPs, remove stale addresses, and export to upstream CDN or WAF.
security-firewall-recommendation-geo-bod: Restrict admin access to trusted regions or VPN ranges to shrink the attack surface.
security-firewall-recommendation-webhook: Push firewall incidents to chat or SOC tooling for real-time response.
security-firewall-default-admin-path: Default admin slug still active. Consider renaming for obscurity.
